articles.title: Ricky Martin sues nephew, alleges million-dollar losses - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The singer's nephew had claimed that Martin had sexually abused him. Martin's lawyers said the claim by the nephew, which he has since recanted, has cost the singer millions of dollars in lost income.
